rotate_head.description: Rotate the head of the lamp to adjust the lighting.

press_toggle_button.description: Press the toggle button to switch the lamp on or off.

rotate_rotation_bar.description: Rotate the rotation bar to adjust the height of the lamp.

clean_lamp_base.description: Clean the lamp base to keep it dust free and shiny.

clean_lamp_head.description: Clean the lamp head to keep it dust free and shiny.

clean_toggle_button.description: Clean the toggle button to ensure smooth operation.

clean_rotation_bar.description: Clean the rotation bar to ensure smooth rotation.

clean_whole_lamp.description: Clean the entire lamp including the base, head, toggle button, and rotation bar.
